topic.title: Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The Hospital Admitting Diagnosis section contains a narrative description of the primary reason for admission to a hospital facility. The section includes an optional entry to record patient conditions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9930, CONF:10391 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15479)/@code="46241-6" HOSPITAL ADMISSION DX (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15480)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry (CONF:9934, CONF:9935)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Hospital Admission Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.34)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15479)/@code="46241-6" HOSPITAL ADMISSION DX (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15480)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry (CONF:9934, CONF:9935)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Hospital Admission Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.34)
